description: The ID of the cell. First two numbers indicate the monkey. The next two letters are assigned for a given electrode position along the cortical surface (ignores depth). The number indicates the recording channel. The last letter differentiates the cells that were recorded.
Increments for each batch of stimuli presentations.
Timing of spike or end-of-trial marker, relative to the onset of the stimulus (ms).
An ID for the "command item", which gives the variables for a given stimulus.
An ID for a specific presentation of the stimulus. Use this to match up spikes with the spike counts (for parameters).
